alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued August 17 at 4:04PM MST until August 17 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Storm Warning for... Northeastern La Paz County in west central Arizona... * Until 445 PM MST. * At 404 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Bouse to near Harcuvar to near Salome, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 39 and 58. US Highway 60 between mile markers 38 and 62. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 29 and 49. Locations impacted include... Salome, Vicksburg, Vicksburg Junction, Wenden and Harcuvar. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
